text: cng klaw theid muhammad “khır lea ca pkpxng phwk than hı phn ca kxallxhˌ pi di hak phraxngkh thrng prarthna hı khwam seiyhay kæ phwk than hrux hak phraxngkh thrng prarthna hı khwam metta kæ phwk than” læa phwk khea ca mi phb khır xun ca kxallxhˌ pen phu khumkhrxng læa pen phu chwyhelux kæ phwk khea
